EmailTemplate.description: Use when returning a report at PPE
EmailTemplate.name: Returned Report - PPE
EmailTemplate.subject: Returned report regarding: #{!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Employee__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
The following Case Report dated {Insert Service Date Thru}, is being returned for the following reason(s):
(INDICATE REASON(S) )
Please make the appropriate changes and resubmit the report.
Please note that this report will not be included in this pay period.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Supervisor.
Thank you.
